body:
Comment 3 by **montsamu**: 
Further apologies as this is not an issue in the simple test case:

sam@sol:~/projects/go/go-twitter-oauth$ cat test.go

package main

import (
        "path";
)

func main() {
        print (path.Join("files", 
"abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"));
}


So I must be doing something wrong. Please cancel/close.
